price: 29. Ir sakyk: „Mano Viešpatie, priversk mane nusileisti ant palaimintos išsilaipinimo vietos, nes Tu esi Geriausias iš tų, kurie atgabena į žemę.“
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَنزِلۡنِي مُنزَلٗا مُّبَارَكٗا وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمُنزِلِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi anzil'nī munzalan mubārakan wa-anta khayru al-munzilīna
